name: The Light Stays On
description:
The Light Stays On is a short, atmospheric experience. As a lighthouse keeper during a terrible storm, you must direct your light beam to illuminate a ship's path and guide them to safety. 

If a rock stays unlit, there's no way they'll be able to see it in time. Who will you prioritise when they all flock to your beacon?

The storm never ends, but the ships keep coming. The sea is unforgiving, but The Light Stays On.

------

To run the game, simply unzip the .rar file into a folder of your choice and open up the .exe file.
